amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following new title: ? TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 601. Each amount appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act that is not required to be appropriated or otherwise made available by a provision of law is reduced by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding levels in the bill by 1% across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 312 (Roll no. 171).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Hefley.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
